PersonalStatement.text: Kayla Watkins, born on 1982-05-30, is a Female based in East Kenneth, Antigua and Barbuda. She is Married and holds Cameroonian nationality. Currently working at Beck, Dixon and Mitchell.

WorkExperience.text: Marketing Specialist at Garza, Brooks and Gomez from 2012 to 2020.
Senior Financial Analyst at Beck, Dixon and Mitchell, 2022 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: PhD in Computer Science from German University in Cairo
Master's in Engineering from University of Technology Sydney

PersonalSkills.text: Leadership: Proven track record of managing cross-functional teams.
Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, she enjoys coding personal projects.
